The ML model is optimized using data from Arctic, coastal, and open waters, ensuring its performance in a variety of optically complex environments. Overall, the ML approach in this study takes into account the unique optical properties and challenging environments of high northern latitude waters by utilizing a regression process that incorporates specific input bands and is optimized for these conditions.
